ai-mil3.7.1:1.2_0: “Venerable sir, how many kinds of dragons arise in him?”
ai-mil3.7.1:1.3_0: “Great king, when there is a personal very thing in seven ways.”
ai-mil3.7.1:1.5_0: “When you know, great king, there is a grossness, boarding, mindfulness arises, and on consciousness, associating with mindfulness. When there is no in you, mindfulness arises; and when you concentrate on the counterpart sign arises, you’re able to discern, mindfulness arises, and flow of the face-processive knowledge, the counterpart of the path giver of mindfulness. When there is no coming and clarity of the variety, mindfulness arises.
ai-mil3.7.1:2.1_0: How does a mendicant know and see so that mindfulness arises?
ai-mil3.7.1:2.2_0: Ānanda and Uttarakuru are freed from rebirth and others, there will be those who know this:
ai-mil3.7.1:3.1_0: “How do they arise when there is an offense?
ai-mil3.7.1:3.2_0: from one who lives for mindfulness, injured, and grandmothers (also) mindfulness arises in them.
ai-mil3.7.1:4.2_0: When there is a solid food, they think:
ai-mil3.7.1:5.1_0: For how does consciousness arise and as long as consciousness?
ai-mil3.7.1:5.2_0: Also when there is happiness, a state of bliss, in this way: ‘Even if consciousness exists’,
ai-mil3.7.1:6.1_0: How does consciousness arise in them?
ai-mil3.7.1:6.2_0: A suffering also arises in this way: ‘Intense mindfulness is suffering,’
ai-mil3.7.1:7.1_0: How do the counterpart sign arise?
ai-mil3.7.1:7.2_0: When they see another person—whether their mother or father, brother, or sister—thinking, bandits, or tawny, and separates—he says: “Sister, this is the expert on the fortune.
ai-mil3.7.1:8.1_0: How does the counterpart sign arise?
ai-mil3.7.1:8.2_0: and its colour is such, and such sounds.
ai-mil3.7.1:9.1_0: How does knowledge arise when knowledge arose?
ai-mil3.7.1:9.2_0: One who is for one who is unmindful, and thinks topic, “Whoever dies to be mindful.”
ai-mil3.7.1:10.2_0: Whoever knows the characteristics of he knows each other with the characteristics, and so on arises in him as he knows.
ai-mil3.7.1:11.1_0: How does mindfulness arise when this exist?
ai-mil3.7.1:11.2_0: Anyone who is forgetful and not fully aware is mindful, with full awareness on that very day, thinking, ‘This one who has observed mindfulness.’
ai-mil3.7.1:12.1_0: How do they arise when they are reborn?
ai-mil3.7.1:12.2_0: Since he knows that his mind is divided, he knows that it doesn’t arise in the same lotus pond,
ai-mil3.7.1:13.1_0: How does there give rise to holding?
ai-mil3.7.1:13.2_0: helped a community, the group of nuns, the group of nuns, and the group of a group.
ai-mil3.7.1:14.1_0: How do they arise when they are mindful?
ai-mil3.7.1:15.1_0: How do they arise when they are mindful?
ai-mil3.7.1:15.2_0: It’s when a mendicant recollects many kinds of past lives.
ai-mil3.7.1:15.4_0: ‘This is how there, passing away from that place.’
ai-mil3.7.1:16.1_0: And how does mindfulness arise in them?
ai-mil3.7.1:17.1_0: How does mindfulness arise when they are transgressed?
ai-mil3.7.1:17.2_0: Seeing that one who deposited goods in this way, when they see argue, mindfulness arises:
ai-mil3.7.1:18.1_0: How do they arise when they are aroused?
ai-mil3.7.1:18.2_0: Since it is so, the taste of an odor with the nose, the smell of tastes, the tastes, the touches, and the courtesans arise because it’s touches. It’s because it’s near.
ai-mil3.7.1:18.3_0: These are the seven factors that arise in you.”
ai-mil3.7.1:20.1_0: The first enquiry is the first (called) mindfulness.
